alert.note: Alert for Nowata; Osage; Rogers; Washington (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:26AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Rogers, northeastern Osage, Washington and southwestern Nowata Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 626 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Shidler to 4 miles northwest of Dewey. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Bartlesville... Nowata... Pawhuska... Dewey... Barnsdall... Copan... Shidler... Wynona... Ochelata... New Alluwe... Bigheart... Pearsonia... Bartlesville Municipal Airport... Hulah... Sunset Lake... Osage Hills State Park... Watova... Okesa... Webb City... Wah Sha She State Park... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
